about_the_game:
🤸🏼‍♀️ Welcome to the magical world of Lily and Leo!


Dive into the imaginative world of Lily and Leo and experience a thrilling puzzle adventure.

In this first episode their dog Quattro has disappeared. This is not at all like the faithful companion - I wonder what happened? I wonder if he's okay? Immediately, the lively Lily and the clever Leo begin their search. The clues lead to the creepy neighbor's garden ... Was that Quattro? Didn't he just howl in the distance? The two adventurers have to act fast.

📖 learn. play. read.

∙ HELP Lily and Leo on their adventure.
∙ EXPERIENCE an exciting story.
∙ PRACTICE reading
∙ SOLVE tricky puzzles
∙ MAKE important decisions
∙ TAKE influence on the story
∙ DRAW the right conclusions
∙ FIND all paths
∙ BUILD, KEEP a cool head, BE a secret agent.

✨ FEATURES

  • Loving story with fun and humour
  • Mix of book and game
  • Read-aloud function - all characters have their own voice
  • Different paths through the story
  • Audio book function (e.g. in the car)
  • Tricky puzzles covering the areas dialogue, detective, skill, logic, and discovery

🎭 MEANINGFUL ENTERTAINMENT

  • Beneficial and educational entertainment
  • Learning through fun
  • Training key skills, such as reading, arithmetic, and logical thinking, as well as social skills
  • Pedagogically valuable through a didactic concept

🚸 CHILD SAFETY

  • Safe children's game
  • No advertising
  • Content suitable for children
  • Play alone or together as a family

🧑🏿‍👩🏻‍🧒🏽 Dear Parents

The development of your children is very important to us. That's why "Lily & Leo" is based on the elementary school curriculum. With this reading adventure we want to offer your children exciting entertainment that stimulates their imagination and teaches them something new. In addition, the game contains only content suitable for children. This guarantees the safety of your children. Let your children tell you what they have experienced with Lily and Leo, turn on the audiobook function in the car or play it together as a family.


We hope you enjoy reading and puzzling! 🎮

In this first episode their dog Quattro has disappeared. This is not at all like the faithful companion - I wonder what happened? I wonder if he's okay? Immediately, the lively Lily and the clever Leo begin their search. The clues lead to the creepy neighbor's garden ... Was that Quattro? Didn't he just howl in the distance? mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: Apple M1 | Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: The Adventures of Lily & Leo

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The Adventures of Lily & Leo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Discover the magical world of Lily and Leo and help them find their faithful companion Quattro in this captivating puzzle adventure. Set up a tripod, follow animal tracks, have clever conversations and much more to track down the missing dog.
